name: I Am You | Limited Edition Giclée Print
description: Limited Edition Giclée Print Edition of 100 _ I Am You is a meditation on unconditional love. It is based on twelve point geometry, the geometry of Anahata, the heart chakra. It is a guiding light that gently opens and attunes the heart through subtle vibrations, to pure alignment with infinite source energy. In union with Source, our boundaries of ego and skin dissolve into unity consciousness. We see beyond the illusion of separation, cultivating compassion for every human being as our brother and sister. _ 12 x 12 in Printed on Premier 310g 100% cotton archival paper Each print is hand signed and numbered, and comes with a Certificate of Authenticity. Shipped flat via USPS Please allow up to 2 weeks for your order to be shipped US $5.00 International $15.00

name: The Inner Radiance | Limited Edition Giclée Print
description: Limited Edition Giclée Print Edition of 100 _ Every physical being is essentially an aggregation of material substance, and yet we are alive with consciousness and energy. It is proven that every aspect of life expresses a form of radiant energy, or an inner radiance; a vibration of a Divine nature. It also seems to hold true that every aspect of life exists for the sole purpose of emitting this energy, here on Earth. The Inner Radiance is an attempt to visualize this mysterious life force; an alignment with and a reflection of one’s own divine source energy. _ 12 x 12 in Printed on Premier 310g 100% cotton archival paper Each print is hand signed and numbered, and comes with a Certificate of Authenticity. Shipped flat via USPS Please allow up to 2 weeks for your order to be shipped US $5.00 International $15.00
